NPC.name: raijin
NPC.description: This dark blue scaled lizard girl is jumpy, and small, notably shorter than the others you've encountered recently. Her claws are small and short and she lacks the raw athletic look of the raptors, there must be some other threat she poses. Perhaps the crystalline stubby horns and crystalline nodes along her spine from neck to tailtip have something to do with it.

missText.text: The raijin's lightning bolt fails to hit TARGET

hitText.text: the raijin's lightning bolt hits TARGET for VALUE shock damage.
